pullRequest.title: Icelandic Certificate Profile update
pullRequest.bodyText: This is an update to the Icelandic Certification profile.  The profile is more aligned to what has been implemented for FI and based on experience with working with the EJBCA Certificate Authority software solution.

commit.message: Added Icelandic is_IS.UTF-8 locale support to ansible/roles/xroad-base/tasks/ubuntu.yml

Reverted "Added Icelandic is_IS.UTF-8 locale support to ansible/roles/xroad-base/tasks/ubuntu.yml"

This reverts commit 37912198473204cca2a8362c699d20007404aa09.
Updated Icelandic Certificate Auth and Sign profiles

nodes.bodyText:
clientId.xRoadInstance is already encoded as countryName and clientId.memberClass as organizationName. If the intention is to make the DN unique in case the member is a client of multiple security servers, maybe this should be something like:
 params.getServerId().toShortString(); // INSTANCE/CLASS/MEMBERCODE/SERVERCODE

(And even that is prone to errors since serialNumber should be a ASN.1 PrintableString (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/PrintableString), and serverId can include "non-PrintableString" chars)
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -45,23 +45,38 @@
      */
     public IsSignCertificateProfileInfo(Parameters params) {
         super(new DnFieldDescription[] {
-                // Country Code
-                new EnumLocalizedFieldDescriptionImpl(
-                        "C", DnFieldLabelLocalizationKey.COUNTRY_CODE, "IS").setReadOnly(true),
 
-                // Organization name
+                // Instance identifier
                 new EnumLocalizedFieldDescriptionImpl(
-                        "O", DnFieldLabelLocalizationKey.ORGANIZATION_NAME, "").setReadOnly(false),
+                        "C",
+                        DnFieldLabelLocalizationKey.INSTANCE_IDENTIFIER,
+                        params.getClientId().getXRoadInstance()
+                ).setReadOnly(true),
 
-                // Serialnumber
-                new EnumLocalizedFieldDescriptionImpl("serialNumber", DnFieldLabelLocalizationKey.SERIAL_NUMBER,
-                        params.getClientId().getXRoadInstance() + "/" + params.getServerId().getServerCode()
-                                + "/" + params.getClientId().getMemberClass()).setReadOnly(true),
+                // Member class
+                new EnumLocalizedFieldDescriptionImpl(
+                        "O",
+                        DnFieldLabelLocalizationKey.MEMBER_CLASS,
+                        params.getClientId().getMemberClass()
+                ).setReadOnly(true),
 
                 // Member code
                 new EnumLocalizedFieldDescriptionImpl(
-                        "CN", DnFieldLabelLocalizationKey.MEMBER_CODE, params.getClientId().getMemberCode())
-                        .setReadOnly(true) });
+                        "CN",
+                        DnFieldLabelLocalizationKey.MEMBER_CODE,
+                        params.getClientId().getMemberCode()
+                ).setReadOnly(true),
+
+                // Serialnumber
+                new EnumLocalizedFieldDescriptionImpl(
+                        "serialNumber",
+                        DnFieldLabelLocalizationKey.SERIAL_NUMBER,
+                        params.getClientId().getXRoadInstance()
+                        + "/" + params.getServerId().getServerCode()
+                        + "/" + params.getClientId().getMemberClass()
+                ).setReadOnly(true)

nodes.bodyText: Note: Valid values for the countryName attribute are ISO 3166 alpha-2 codes (2-character country codes). It would be safer to map the instance identifier to e.g. "O" (and memberClass to OU) in case a CA uses strict validation.

nodes.bodyText: Note: Valid values for the countryName attribute are ISO 3166 alpha-2 codes (2-character country codes). It would be safer to map the instance identifier to e.g. "organizationName" in case a CA uses strict validation.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -39,21 +39,28 @@
      */
     public IsAuthCertificateProfileInfo(Parameters params) {
         super(new DnFieldDescription[] {
-                // Country Code
+                // Instance identifier
                 new EnumLocalizedFieldDescriptionImpl(
-                        "C", DnFieldLabelLocalizationKey.COUNTRY_CODE, "IS").setReadOnly(true),
+                        "C",
+                        DnFieldLabelLocalizationKey.INSTANCE_IDENTIFIER,

nodes.bodyText:
Maybe serialNumber value could be something like  params.getServerId().getOwner().toShortString()  if the intention is to make the DN unique (serverCode is already mapped to CN).
Note that serialNumber should be an ASN.1 PrintableString (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/PrintableString), and the identifiers (serverId components) can include "non-PrintableString" chars.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -39,21 +39,28 @@
      */
     public IsAuthCertificateProfileInfo(Parameters params) {
         super(new DnFieldDescription[] {
-                // Country Code
+                // Instance identifier
                 new EnumLocalizedFieldDescriptionImpl(
-                        "C", DnFieldLabelLocalizationKey.COUNTRY_CODE, "IS").setReadOnly(true),
+                        "C",
+                        DnFieldLabelLocalizationKey.INSTANCE_IDENTIFIER,
+                        params.getServerId().getXRoadInstance()
+                ).setReadOnly(true),
 
-                // Organization name
+                // Server code
                 new EnumLocalizedFieldDescriptionImpl(
-                        "O", DnFieldLabelLocalizationKey.ORGANIZATION_NAME, "").setReadOnly(false),
+                        "CN",
+                        DnFieldLabelLocalizationKey.SERVER_CODE,
+                        params.getServerId().getServerCode()
+                ).setReadOnly(true),
 
                 // Serialnumber
-                new EnumLocalizedFieldDescriptionImpl("serialNumber", DnFieldLabelLocalizationKey.SERIAL_NUMBER,
-                        params.getServerId().getXRoadInstance() + "/" + params.getServerId().getServerCode()
-                                + "/" + params.getServerId().getMemberClass()).setReadOnly(true),
-
-                // Server code
                 new EnumLocalizedFieldDescriptionImpl(
-                        "CN", DnFieldLabelLocalizationKey.SERVER_DNS_NAME, "").setReadOnly(false) });
+                        "serialNumber",
+                        DnFieldLabelLocalizationKey.SERIAL_NUMBER,
+                        params.getServerId().getXRoadInstance()
+                        + "/" + params.getServerId().getServerCode()
+                        + "/" + params.getServerId().getMemberClass()

commit.message:
Updated Certificate profiles

The following code changes impliment the following certifcate profiles for the Icelandic State in project Straumurinn.

----------------------------------------------------
Signing Cert:
----------------------------------------------------
C=IS
O=IS-DEV
OU=CLASS
CN=MEMBERCODE
serialNumber=IS-DEV/CLASS/OWNERMEMBERCODE/SERVERCODE

----------------------------------------------------
Auth Cert:
----------------------------------------------------
C=IS
O=IS-DEV
OU=CLASS
CN=SECURITYSERVERFQDN
serialNumber=IS-DEV/CLASS/OWNERMEMBERCODE/SERVERCODE
Updated certification profiles according to suggestions from @jhyoty. Compilation was successful
